name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On December 26, lawyer Xiao Zhi'e said that her client Wang Zhongzhi was imprisoned for 12 years on trumped-up charges, and when he was released from prison at the age of 35, his wife and children had left him and his family had been destroyed.
After that, Wang Zhongzhi appealed 2,465 times in 38 years, and finally got a not guilty verdict at the age of 73, but now he is 90 years old and has not received any compensation. The court believed that in 1957, when Wang Zhongzhi was in labor reform, the "State Compensation Law" had not yet been implemented, so no compensation would be given.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: January 2 (Released) Xiayi County, Henan Province. A roadside banner reads "Privately slaughtering pigs is a crime"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
In the early morning of January 2, in Changsha, Hunan, an elderly man who was sleeping soundly in the cafeteria of Innovation Senior High School was splashed with cold water by an unknown person.
The elderly man’s family: We contracted the school cafeteria last year and paid a deposit of 5 million yuan, but the school still owes more than 1.7 million yuan. In order to get back the deposit and meal fee, the elderly man slept in the cafeteria to get money.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Female employee forged pregnancy ultrasound report to evade prison
Inner Mongolia Xilinhot Ms. Zhao and a partner operated a supermarket for only half a year before the supermarket closed down. Surveillance footage showed that more than 20 employees of the supermarket stole goods from the store, and even partners and distributors transferred a large number of supermarket goods. A total of more than 2 million yuan was stolen and no compensation has been paid so far. Among the employees who have been sentenced, Liu Moufeng, who was a supermarket cashier, did not serve a day in prison because of repeated pregnancies.
Ms. Zhao said: "Every time she was about to be arrested, she got pregnant, and when she was about to go to prison, she gave birth. From the court's verdict to now, she has not served a day of actual imprisonment."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On December 31, Hu Xijin called on the senior members to seek truth from facts and avoid confrontation.
Some netizens also dug up a 2012 People's Daily Weibo post calling for fewer arrests of "traitors" and pointing out that fair and just reforms are imperative.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On January 2, a truck loaded with chemicals exploded in front of the Nanlou Hospital in Dashiqiao, Yingkou, Liaoning, igniting several surrounding cars. The scene was full of flames. It was reported that the truck was loaded with magnesium powder, and the metal combustible powder splashed and caused three explosions. It has caused 2 deaths and 2 injuries.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
In Zoucheng, Jining, Shandong, drivers started to go on strike on January 1st because the bus company had not paid them wages for eight months.
An informed netizen submitted a post saying: On the 2nd, the police arrived and started arresting people. After arresting them, they threatened the driver, saying that they would report to his wife's unit and the child's school, affecting his wife's work and the child's future.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On January 1, after Jining bus drivers started a strike due to 8 months of unpaid wages and insurance, the bus company urgently introduced a solution, promising to pay one month's wages within 5 days, and another 1-2 months' wages before the Spring Festival, and finally pay all the unpaid wages before May. And gradually solve the problem of unpaid pension insurance.
Under the pressure of the police and the temporary solution to the unpaid wages, Zoucheng Bus resumed normal operations today (January 3).

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On January 2, Gu Ailing responded to outside doubts: I will always represent China
Gu Ailing responded for the first time to the discordant voices that Paris Olympics was hyped, saying "It's all rumors!" "Under any circumstances, I will always represent China." "Hearing these voices, it's like a knife stabbed in my heart. Of course, it's painful, because most of the rumors on the Internet are rumors. I have always hoped to bring Chinese culture to the world and share it with the world."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: The cleaning staff of the obstetrics department of the hospital was exposed to reselling babies and making tens of thousands of yuan per order, and claimed that he was doing good deeds. "Wang Mouyun, a cleaner on the 4th floor of the obstetrics department of the Women and Children's Hospital in Datong City, Shanxi Province, participated in the reselling of babies many times and made profits from it." In early November 2024, the anti-trafficking volunteer @Shangguan Zhengyi received the above report. According to his understanding, Wang Mouyun admitted in person when chatting with others that he had been involved in this matter for a long time, and "introduced two babies in October." The prices of the babies sold varied, and the boys and girls were different. According to the clues, there was a baby girl in November, and the seller asked for 75,000 yuan. Wang Mouyun asked the buyer for 105,000 yuan, and the contract had been signed. On November 8, 2024, the reporter of Nanfengchuang went to Datong with Shangguan Zhengyi and met Wang Mouyun offline. She admitted the fact that she introduced the sale of children and called it "doing a good thing." At the same time, she said that a director of the obstetrics department of the hospital had also participated in this matter.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On December 31, the Shanghai Municipal Government issued the "Several Measures for Shanghai to Accelerate the Improvement of Fertility Support Policy System and Promote the Construction of a Fertility-Friendly Society", which was ridiculed by netizens.
The document mentioned: We must increase economic support, establish a fertility subsidy system, set up fertility-friendly posts, and support units to implement flexible working hours. And give full play to the role of the Party and Mass Service Center and strengthen social propaganda and guidance.
Netizens: Private enterprises are surviving in the cracks, and this benefit will only be given to central state-owned enterprises.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Recently, the winter flu season has arrived, and emergency rooms in hospitals across the country are full. Even on New Year's Eve, children's hospitals are crowded. At 6 a.m. on January 1, the hospital was already full of waiting parents. And many cases of infection are mixed viral infections.
Don't underestimate the flu and colds. 600,000 people die from the flu every year worldwide.
In the near future, everyone should wear masks, avoid going to crowded places, and protect themselves.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
The Beijing News reported: In 2022, the hospital's chief physician Wang Mouqing was arrested for allegedly introducing the sale of babies, but was not prosecuted. Netizens questioned: Has this formed an industrial chain?
In 2022, Wang Mouqing participated in introducing the buyer and seller of babies to each other. In May of the same year, the baby born by a 15-year-old girl was sold to another couple, and the girl was admitted to the hospital with the buyer's identity information when she gave birth. The police discovered the above-mentioned baby sale incident when investigating the murder case of the 15-year-old girl's ex-boyfriend
The prosecutor's decision not to prosecute showed that the buyer paid 68,000 yuan after taking the baby away, and the seller's mother received 41,000. Wang Mouqing's behavior constituted the crime of forging state agency documents, and the crime was minor, so it was decided not to prosecute.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: The supermarket, located in the city center and covering an area of more than 3,000 square meters, closed down after seven months of operation. During this period, 6 tons of eggs were stolen.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On January 2, many media reported that a 2000 male student could endure loneliness and work on a sewing machine for more than ten hours a day to make hundreds of pairs of women's pants. The man said that he wanted to open his own women's pants factory after learning the skills after working for a few years. The media said that the textile industry is an important force in promoting new quality productivity.
Netizen: Other factories make two working time reports to avoid being investigated, but your working hours are directly reported in the news.
Overtime work may violate the requirements of European and American supply chain audits

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
According to Apple's supplier code of conduct and the legal requirements of European and American countries for supply chain due diligence, Apple requires its supplier workers to work no more than 60 hours per week.
Most European and American companies also have similar legal obligations for supply chain compliance review for supply chains or goods entering Europe and the United States.
As the main supplier of Apple, BYD is well known for its overtime work.
Please share your working hours.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Some netizens commented: This is the modern version of Camel Xiangzi, who works diligently every day and dreams of owning his own women's trousers factory through his own efforts one day.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On January 2, the State Administration for Market Regulation held an online press conference and announced that starting today, the national food safety "You click, I check, service benefits people's livelihood" public opinion collection system was officially launched. The system allows people to click on the food they care about and hope that the government departments will inspect at any time, 24 hours a day, 365 days a year.
However, it was questioned and ridiculed by netizens in the comment area

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On January 2, China imposed sanctions on 28 U.S. companies, adding them to the export control list and prohibiting the sale of dual-use products to them. The sanctioned companies include: General Dynamics, Boeing Defense, Lockheed Martin and Raytheon Missiles and Defense and other major defense contractors

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On January 2, a woman bought a Nezha electric car, and its range dropped from 400 kilometers to 40 kilometers in more than a year, which was not enough for commuting to and from get off work.
The 4S shop found that it was a battery failure, but the battery pack was out of stock and could not be replaced.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Recently, the media has been promoting the way to get rich: selling balloons.
According to the Cover News, on January 1, Zhang Yufei from Chengdu earned 6,523 yuan from selling balloons in one night, which is equal to her monthly salary. She purchased 120 helium balloons from an online shopping platform at a cost price of 2 yuan, and sold them at a flexible price of 10 to 40 yuan.
But there are also media reports: A senior student in Jinan went to the street to sell balloons before 4 o'clock in the evening to get a good position. He only sold 5 balloons at 9 o'clock in the evening, and even lost his capital.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
The store mistakenly sold Gnaphalium as Sea Breeze Vine, which caused a person to be hospitalized and then concealed the truth, causing another person to accidentally take it and die half a month later
At the end of November, in Zhaoqing, Guangdong, an old man went to a store to buy a bundle of Sea Breeze Vine to make soup to remove dampness. On December 10, the old man had chest pain and fell into a coma after drinking the soup, and was diagnosed by the doctor with Gnaphalium poisoning
According to the family, on November 27, a couple also bought Sea Breeze Vine in the store and were poisoned and rescued, but the store owner concealed the matter, causing the old man to accidentally eat and die half a month later
The couple told the Red Star News reporter that they opened a hardware store nearby and also showed symptoms of poisoning after drinking the "Sea Breeze Vine" they bought. After being sent to the hospital, gastric lavage and vomiting were performed. They were recently transferred to the intensive care unit in Guangzhou and were rescued.
It is understood that after the incident, the market supervision and public security departments of Huaiji County have intervened. The case filing notice issued by the Huaiji County Public Security Bureau on December 15, 2024 showed that a case investigation had been filed for the sale of toxic food by the store involved. On January 2, Red...
fullContent:
店铺误将断肠草当海风藤销售，致人入院后隐瞒，致另一人半月后误服死亡
11月底 广东肇庆，一老人到店铺购买一捆海风藤煲汤祛湿。12月10日，老人煲汤饮用后胸痛昏迷不醒，被医生诊断断肠草中毒
据家属了解，11月27日也有夫妇也在该店买海风藤后中毒被抢救回来，但店主隐瞒该事，导致老人半月后误食死亡
该夫妇向红星新闻记者介绍，他们在附近开五金店，饮用购买回来的“海风藤”后也出现中毒症状，被送医后洗胃、催吐，最近转院至广州的重症监护室才被抢救回来。
据了解，事发后，怀集县市监、公安部门已介入。怀集县公安局于2024年12月15日出具的立案告知书显示，已就涉事店铺销售有毒食品一案进行立案侦查。1月2日，红星新闻记者从怀集县市场监管局了解到，经查，涉事店铺误将断肠草当成“海风藤”进行销售。目前，该商店老板已被公安部门拘留。

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Netizen contribution: The Chunjintai villa project invested by the Kunshan government of Jiangsu Province has been exceeding the noise standard every day since construction began on June 5. Local residents complained every day, and the Environmental Protection Bureau finally came to measure it once, and it was only 74 decibels. However, the residents themselves used equipment to test and found that the noise in their homes was as high as 84.5 decibels most of the time during the day, and sometimes even as high as 120 decibels. After July 15, construction pile driving caused hundreds of cracks in the walls of many surrounding residents' houses. Now the illegal construction of Chunjintai has continued. However, the Suzhou and Kunshan governments completely ignored the residents' complaints, and the residents tried to call the police to complain to no avail.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: An old Foxconn production line employee submitted an article. He was anonymous because he was afraid of retaliation and losing his job. He wanted to report Foxconn's new union chairman Liu Huiying, who had a corruption scandal in the company and had never worked in the union, but was suddenly elected as the union chairman with a high vote this year. I heard that the administration forcibly intervened in the election of the union chairman. Before, our union has always been very good, but it has always taken good care of us front-line workers. We have everything we should have during the holidays. "Colleagues said that Liu Huiying is the assistant of Huang Qiulian, the second-in-command of Foxconn. I heard from colleagues that this supervisor has been managing the park shops and waste business for a long time. She is very rich. I also heard that she lives in Nanshan Yuefu, a high-end real estate in Shenzhen, and drives a Land Rover. How can such a union chairman speak for us? Please pay attention to the actual situation. We workers work in Foxconn and seek stability and security. We don't want these people to corrupt our benefits. I ask you to speak for our employees. What I said are all facts. Some of the situations...
fullContent:
富士康老产线员工投稿 因怕被打击报复、丢掉工作所以匿名
他想举报富士康新的工会主席刘慧颖，其在公司有贪腐丑闻，也没干过工会工作，但在今年突然就高票当选工会主席。听说是行政强行插手工会主席选举工作，之前我们工会一直以来不说好到不得了，但一直很关照我们一线工人，逢年过节是该有的都有
“同事说刘慧颖是富士康二号人物黄秋莲助理，听同事说这个主管长期管理着园区商铺和废料生意，肥的不行，还听说她住着深圳高档楼盘南山悦府，开路虎，这种工会主席怎么能为我们发声，请关注了解一下实际情况，我们工人在富士康上班，求的是稳定，安稳，不希望让这些人把我们福利给腐败了，请求你们为我们员工发声，我说的都是事实，其中一些情况是在同事聊天中听到的消息，你们都可以向富士康求证。”

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Pinned Weibo on January 3: Keywords repeatedly mentioned by Xi Jinping in his New Year's message
China News Network said:
"President Xi Jinping's 2025 New Year's message has arrived as scheduled. This is the 12th consecutive year that President Xi Jinping has delivered a New Year's message. In the New Year's messages over the years, there are many words that Xi Jinping has repeatedly mentioned, such as "people", "struggle", "development", "peace", "confidence", "dream", etc. These high-frequency words record the feelings of the country and witness the development of the country"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On December 26, a hospital in Shandong (publishing IP) said on the Internet that due to the country's large-scale investment in nucleic acid testing, free COVID-19 testing and other treatment work during the epidemic, especially the delay in medical insurance repayments, the hospital has been in financial difficulties. The hospital decided to issue all the wages owed in 2024 in the name of individual workers, and the loan will be guaranteed by the hospital.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
January 1, Henan. Blogger interviews passersby: How do you feel about your life this year?
Passersby: "There is nothing to look forward to, just live one day at a time"
"Business is not easy in a tight economy"
"I have been owed eight months of salary, my wish is to get my salary back"
Netizens said: Why is it different from what CCTV broadcasts?

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On the morning of January 3, the Korean Public Prosecutor's Office initiated the execution of the arrest warrant against Yoon Seok-yeol.
The Korean Public Prosecutor's Office and the police went to Yoon Seok-yeol's Korean presidential residence in Hannam-dong, Yongsan District, Seoul.
However, the Korean Presidential Guard, which was responsible for the security of the residence, blocked the arrest. After a five-hour standoff, the Korean Public Prosecutor's Office announced the suspension of the arrest at 1:30 p.m. local time.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Today: 
Dr. Li Wenliang was reprimanded by the police for posting in a WeChat group: "Untrue" remarks about 7 confirmed cases of SARS in the South China Fruit and Seafood Market.
